1 <?php

3 namespace Ubiquity\orm\traits;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\orm\OrmUtils;
6 use Ubiquity\log\Logger;
7 use Ubiquity\orm\parser\Reflexion;
8 
9 class DAORelationsAssignmentsTrait {
10  protected static function setToMember($member, $instance, $value, $accessor) {
11  $instance->$accessor($value);
12  $instance->_rest[$member]=$value;
13  }
14 
15  protected static function getAccessor($member, $instance,$part) {
16  $accessor="set" . ucfirst($member);
17  if (method_exists($instance, $accessor)) {
18  return $accessor;
19  }
20  $class=get_class($instance);
21  Logger::warn("DAO", "Missing modifier " . $accessor . " in " . $class,$part);
22  return false;
23  }
24 
25  protected static function _affectsRelationObjects($className,$classPropKey,$manyToOneQueries,$oneToManyQueries,$manyToManyParsers,$objects,$included,$useCache){
26  if(\sizeof($manyToOneQueries)>0){
27  self::_affectsObjectsFromArray($manyToOneQueries,$included, function($object,$member,$manyToOneObjects,$fkField,$accessor){
28  self::affectsManyToOneFromArray($object,$member,$manyToOneObjects,$fkField,$accessor);
29  },'getManyToOne');
30  }
31  if(\sizeof($oneToManyQueries)>0){
32  self::_affectsObjectsFromArray($oneToManyQueries,$included, function($object,$member,$relationObjects,$fkField,$accessor,$class,$prop) use ($classPropKey){
33  self::affectsOneToManyFromArray($object,$member,$relationObjects,$fkField,$accessor,$class,$prop,$classPropKey);
34  },'getOneToMany');
35  }
36  if(\sizeof($manyToManyParsers)>0){
37  self::_affectsManyToManyObjectsFromArray($className,$manyToManyParsers, $objects,$included,$useCache);
38  }
39  }
40 
41  private static function affectsManyToOneFromArray($object,$member,$manyToOneObjects,$fkField,$accessor){
42  if(isset($object->$fkField)){
43  $value=$manyToOneObjects[$object->$fkField];
44  self::setToMember($member, $object, $value, $accessor);
45  }
46  }
47 
56  private static function affectsOneToManyFromArray($instance, $member, $array=null, $mappedByAccessor=null,$accessor="",$class="",$prop=null,$classPropKey=null) {
57  $ret=[];
58  self::_getOneToManyFromArray($ret,$array, Reflexion::getPropValue($instance,$classPropKey), $mappedByAccessor,$prop);
59  self::setToMember($member, $instance, $ret, $accessor);
60  }
61 
62  private static function _affectsObjectsFromArray($queries,$included,$affectsCallback,$part,$useCache=NULL){
63  $includedNext=false;
64  foreach ($queries as $key=>$pendingRelationsRequest){
65  list($class,$member,$fkField)=\explode("|", $key);
66  if(is_array($included)){
67  $includedNext=self::_getIncludedNext($included, $member);
68  }
69  $objectsParsers=$pendingRelationsRequest->getObjectsConditionParsers();
70  $prop=null;
71  if('getOneToMany'===$part){
72  $prop=OrmUtils::getFirstPropKey($class);
73  $fkField="get" . ucfirst($fkField);
74  }
75  foreach ($objectsParsers as $objectsConditionParser){
76  $objectsConditionParser->compileParts();
77  $relationObjects=self::_getAll($class,$objectsConditionParser->getConditionParser(),$includedNext,$useCache);
78  $objects=$objectsConditionParser->getObjects();
79  if($accessor=self::getAccessor($member, current($objects), $part)){
80  foreach ($objects as $object){
81  $affectsCallback($object, $member,$relationObjects,$fkField,$accessor,$class,$prop);
82  }
83  }
84  }
85  }
86  }
87 
88  private static function _affectsManyToManyObjectsFromArray($objectsClass,$parsers,$objects,$included,$useCache=NULL){
89  $includedNext=false;
90  $prop=OrmUtils::getFirstPropKey($objectsClass);
91  foreach ($parsers as $key=>$parser){
92  list($class,$member)=\explode("|", $key);
93  if(is_array($included)){
94  $includedNext=self::_getIncludedNext($included, $member);
95  }
96  $myPkValues=[];
97  $cParser=self::generateManyToManyParser($parser, $myPkValues);
98  $relationObjects=self::_getAll($class,$cParser,$includedNext,$useCache);
99  if($accessor=self::getAccessor($member, current($objects), 'getManyToMany')){
100  foreach ($objects as $object){
101  $pkV=Reflexion::getPropValue($object, $prop);
102  if(isset($myPkValues[$pkV])){
103  $ret=self::getManyToManyFromArrayIds($class,$relationObjects, $myPkValues[$pkV]);
104  self::setToMember($member, $object, $ret, $accessor);
105  }
106  }
107  }
108  }
109  }
110 }
